<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H6386|פְּלַג]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּלַג‎</span>] **verb** ==split, divide== (Late Hebrew chiefly in secondary meanings and derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***divide, split***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּלֵיג‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***divide***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ravine, stream***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***palgu***</u></abbr>, ***canal***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְלְגָה‎</span> [[Gen.10.25|Gen 10:25]] the earth ***was divided.*** 

**Pi\`el 1.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular ***gL'Pi\`el*** [[Job.38.25|Job 38:25]] ***cleave*** a channel for rain. 

**2.** ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּלַּג‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:52n»§ 52n</sup>) [[Ps.55.10|Ps 55:10]] ***divide*** their speech (their counsels).
